body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! This is Jason Hayes from HealthGuard Pharmacy Support. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I have a serious complaint about my privacy being violated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Marie. Protecting your privacy is a top priority for us. Can you first provide me with your full name and date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's Marie Baker, and my date of birth is April two, one nine nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie. I've got your details here. Now, can you please tell me more about the issue you're experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My prescription details were discussed openly by your staff in the presence of other customers. I'm furious!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand why you're upset, and I'm terribly sorry this happened. Confidentiality is crucial, and what occurred is unacceptable. I'm going to report this to our privacy team immediately. Can you remember the date and time this occurred?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it was last Wednesday at around three PM.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for this information. We'll investigate this as a matter of urgency. Rest assured, we will take the necessary steps to ensure this doesn't happen again. I'll personally keep you updated. Is there an email or phone number where we can reach you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email is marie.baker@email.com, and my phone number is four two four, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for providing that, Marie. We'll be in touch with updates. I truly apologize once again for any distress this has caused. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I just hope this is resolved quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Understood. We're on it, and we'll do our best to resolve this promptly. Thank you for your time and for reaching out to us, Marie. Have a good day!
